scripts.update-admin: cd apps/jaydnserranoadmin && npm update && npm upgrade -y && cd ../..
scripts.update-frontend: cd apps/jaydnserranofrontend && npm update && npm upgrade -y && cd ../..
scripts.update-all: npm run update-admin && npm run update-frontend && npm run update-express
scripts.build-admin: npm run update-admin && cd apps/jaydnserranoadmin && npm run build && mv build jaydnserranoadminbuild && rm -rf ../jaydnserranoadminbuild && mv jaydnserranoadminbuild .. && cd ../..
scripts.build-frontend: npm run update-frontend && cd apps/jaydnserranofrontend && npm run build && mv build jaydnserranofrontendbuild && rm -rf ../jaydnserranofrontendbuild && mv jaydnserranofrontendbuild .. && cd ../..
scripts.build-all: npm run update-all && npm run build-admin && npm run build-frontend
scripts.deploy: npm run build-all && eb deploy node-jaydnserrano-main
